marytts.signalproc.analysis

Class F0TrackerAutocorrelationHeuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.analysis.F0TrackerAutocorrelationHeuristic

  • public class F0TrackerAutocorrelationHeuristic
extends Object
    Autocorrelation based F0 tracker with heuristic rules based on statistics for smoothing and halving/doubling prevention
    Author:
    Oytun Türk
